title: New Orleans Jazz National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       To request an educational program for a school group at the visitor center, please call 504-589-4841 Tue-Sat. To download lesson plans for the park's 4 award winning CDs: Songs of the Mississippi River, Songs for Junior Rangers, Freedom is Coming, and Songs of the Lower Mississippi Delta, click on the links below.         Freedom is Coming: Songs of Freedom, Resistance, and the Underground Railroad Lesson Plans Bruce Barnes          Songs of the Mississippi River Lesson Plans Cindy Samples          Becoming a Story Teller Lesson Plans Richard Johnson, assisted by Allison Baffoni          Songs For Junior Rangers Lesson Plans Johnette Downing
